p: Industrial wastewaters are essential habitat for diverse microbes. Generally, some of the microorganisms have been used for biotreatment of wastewaters ( Abdel-Raouf et al. 2012 ; Bala et al. 2014a , 2014b, 2014c; Bala et al. 2015a , 2015b; Bala 2016). Microorganisms domiciled in diverse wastewaters can also cause diseases such as tuberculosis, cholera, typhoid, dermatomycosis, hepatitis and dysentery ( Shaaban et al. 2004 ).
